DOC.brief_summary: Context : Chest compression represent important physical effort lead fatigue cardiopulmonary resuscitation quality degradation . Despite know harmful effect chest compression interruption , current guideline still recommend provider switch every 2 minute . Feedback impact chest compression quality extend cardiopulmonary resuscitation remain assessed . Study design : simulated prospective monocentric randomize crossover trial . Participants method : Sixty professional rescuer pre-hospital care unit University Hospital Caen ( doctor , nurse ambulance driver ) enrol perform 10 minute continuous chest compression manikin ( ResusciAnne® , Laerdal ) , twice , without feedback device ( CPRmeter® ) . Correct compression score ( main criterion ) define reach target rate , depth leaning time ( record continuously ) . Hypothesis : Feedback device delay fatigue effect arise cardiopulmonary resuscitation .
DOC.brief_title: Compression Is Life In Cardiac Arrest - Fatigue Study
DOC.criteria: Operational staff University hospital Caen prehospital unit medical contraindication refusal
